ayas.translation: Say, ‘I seek the protection of the Lord of the daybreak

bismillah.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.

ayas.translation: from the evil of what He has created,
and from the evil of the dark night when it falls,
ayas.transliteration: wa min sharri ghāsiqin idhā waqab

ayas.translation: and from the evil of the witches, who blow on knots,
and from the evil of the envious one when he envies.’
ayas.transliteration: wa min sharri ḥāsidin idhā ḥasad
